name: Literally Just Squares
description:
Shoot squares! Gather abilities and upgrades! Don't get shot!

------------------------------------------------------

Controller:

Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Shoot
A - Select
Right Trigger - Release homing missiles

Keyboard:

WASD - Move
Arrows - Shoot
Space - Select
F - Release homing missiles

------------------------------------------------------

The game is still in development so let me know what you think in the comments below or talk to me on twitter.

All music and sound done by the talented Jackson Roe.
